files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.AnimationCategoriesChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for animation category changes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.AnimationCategory
files.Summary: Categorizes animations by their type for state management.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.AnimationManager
files.Summary: Manages running animations and coordinates frame updates.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.BoxSelectionAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a box selection rectangle.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.CategorizedAnimationWrapper
files.Summary: Wrapper that adds category information to any animation.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.DelayAnimation
files.Summary: A delay animation that does nothing for a specified duration, then completes. Useful for sequencing animations with pauses.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.Easing
files.Summary: Easing functions for animations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgeColorAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's stroke color.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgeFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's opacity for fade in/out effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgeFlowAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's stroke dash offset for a "flow" effect.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.EdgePulseAnimation
files.Summary: Animates an edge's stroke thickness for pulse/highlight effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.GenericAnimation
files.Summary: A generic animation that calls an update action with the normalized progress (0-1). Useful for simple animations or sequencing multiple animation phases.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.GroupChildrenFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates children of a group fading in or out.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.GroupCollapseAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a group's collapse or expand transition.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.IAnimation
files.Summary: Represents an animation that can be updated over time.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.ICategorizedAnimation
files.Summary: Extended animation interface that includes category information.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.LayoutAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a set of nodes from their current positions to target positions. Intended for layout transitions (auto-layout, arrange, etc.).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.MultiEdgeFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates multiple edges simultaneously with the same animation parameters.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.MultiNodeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates multiple nodes' positions simultaneously.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.MultiNodeAppearAnimation
files.Summary: Animates multiple nodes appearing/disappearing simultaneously.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's position.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeAppearAnimation
files.Summary: Combines fade and scale for a complete appear/disappear effect.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeFadeAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's opacity for fade in/out effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.NodeScaleAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's scale for pop/shrink effects.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.ParallelAnimation
files.Summary: A group of animations that run in parallel.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.SelectionBorderAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a node's selection border fading in.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.SelectionPulseAnimation
files.Summary: Animates a selection highlight pulse effect.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.SequenceAnimation
files.Summary: A sequence of animations that run one after another.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Animation.ViewportAnimation
files.Summary: Animates viewport transitions (pan and zoom).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.BoxSelectionEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for box selection changes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ClipboardManager
files.Summary: Manages clipboard operations for nodes and edges.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ConnectEndEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for connection end event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ConnectStartEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for connection start event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ConnectionCompletedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for connection completed event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ConnectionRejectedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for connection rejected event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ContextMenuRequestedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for context menu request.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.BackgroundVariant
files.Summary: Background pattern variants for the flow canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.ContextMenuEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for context menu opening.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.FlowBackground
files.Summary: A customizable background control for FlowCanvas with multiple pattern variants. Inspired by React Flow's Background component.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.FlowCanvasContextMenu
files.Summary: Provides context menu functionality for FlowCanvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.FlowPanel
files.Summary: A positioned overlay panel that can be placed at various positions within a FlowCanvas. Inspired by React Flow's Panel component.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.MinimapRenderControl
files.Summary: High-performance minimap rendering using direct DrawingContext instead of UI elements. This avoids the O(n) overhead of creating Rectangle/Line controls for each node/edge.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.NodeToolbar
files.Summary: A floating toolbar that appears near selected nodes. Inspired by React Flow's NodeToolbar component.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.NodeToolbarPosition
files.Summary: Defines the position of the NodeToolbar relative to the selected node(s).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Controls.PanelPosition
files.Summary: Defines the position of a FlowPanel relative to its container.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.EdgeClickedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for edge clicked event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.EdgeDisconnectedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for edge disconnection (dropped in empty space).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.EdgeLabelCommittedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for when an edge's label is committed.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.EdgeLabelEditRequestedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for edge label edit request. Raised when a user double-clicks an edge label to edit it.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.EdgeReconnectedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for edge reconnection.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.FlowCanvas
files.Summary: FlowCanvas partial - Animation API and helpers.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.FlowCanvasSettings
files.Summary: Configuration settings for the FlowCanvas control.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GridRenderer
files.Summary: Renders the background grid for the canvas using efficient drawing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupCollapsedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for group collapsed state change.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupManager
files.Summary: Manages group operations including auto-sizing, collapse state, and drag-to-add.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupProxyManager
files.Summary: Manages proxy ports and edge re-routing when groups are collapsed. When a group is collapsed, edges that cross the group boundary are re-routed to proxy ports on the group, maintaining visual connectivity.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.GroupToggleCollapseEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for group collapse toggle request.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.IFlowCanvasContext
files.Summary: Provides access to the current graph and settings context. Extended interface for managers that also need settings access.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.IGraphContext
files.Summary: Provides access to the current graph context. Implemented by FlowCanvas to provide graph access to manager classes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.IInputState
files.Summary: Base interface for all canvas input states. Implements the State Pattern for clean input handling.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.InputStateBase
files.Summary: Base class for input states with default implementations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.InputStateContext
files.Summary: Shared context passed to all input states. Contains references to canvas components and raises events.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.InputStateMachine
files.Summary: Manages input state transitions and delegates events to the current state.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.StateChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for state changes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.StateTransitionResult
files.Summary: Represents the result of a state transition.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.AnimatingNodesState
files.Summary: Input state active during node animations (position transitions, appear/disappear effects). Allows viewport interactions (pan/zoom) while blocking node interactions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.AnimatingState
files.Summary: Input state used while animations are running. While active, user input is suppressed to prevent conflicts with animated transitions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.AnimatingViewportState
files.Summary: Input state active during viewport animations (pan/zoom transitions). Allows cancellation via click or key press, and permits zoom wheel interactions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.BoxSelectingState
files.Summary: State for box selection of multiple nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.ConnectingState
files.Summary: State for creating a new connection by dragging from a port.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.DraggingState
files.Summary: State for dragging selected nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.IdleState
files.Summary: The default idle state - handles initial interactions and transitions to other states.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.PanningState
files.Summary: State for panning the canvas viewport.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.ReconnectingState
files.Summary: State for reconnecting an existing edge by dragging its endpoint. Similar to React Flow's reconnectable edges - the edge visual updates in real-time.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Input.States.ResizingState
files.Summary: State for resizing a node via drag handles.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.LabelEditManager
files.Summary: Manages inline label editing for nodes and edges. Supports both visual tree mode and direct rendering mode.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Layout.LayoutTransitionManager
files.Summary: Provides a minimal API for animating layout transitions (node position changes) without coupling to layout algorithms.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeDragStartEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node drag start event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeDragStopEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node drag stop event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeLabelCommittedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for when a node's label is committed.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeLabelEditRequestedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node label edit request. Raised when a user double-clicks a node to edit its label.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeResizedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node resize completion.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodeResizingEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node resize in progress.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodesAddedToGroupEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for nodes added to group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodesDraggedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node drag completion.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.NodesDraggingEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for nodes being dragged (in progress).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ProxyEdgeInfo
files.Summary: Information about a proxied edge.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ProxyPortInfo
files.Summary: Information about a proxy port on a collapsed group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.BackgroundRenderers.BackgroundRenderContext
files.Summary: Context information passed to background renderers.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.BackgroundRenderers.BackgroundRendererRegistry
files.Summary: Manages registration and rendering of custom background renderers.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.BackgroundRenderers.IBackgroundRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom background renderers. Implement this to render custom backgrounds behind the main graph content.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.DirectGraphRenderer
files.Summary:
A high-performance graph renderer that draws directly to a DrawingContext, bypassing the Avalonia visual tree for nodes and edges. This is optimized for large graphs (500+ nodes) where per-element Controls are too slow.

Uses GraphRenderModel for all geometry calculations to ensure 100% visual parity with the normal VisualTree renderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgePathHelper
files.Summary: Helper class for creating edge path geometries between points.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgeRenderers.EdgeRenderContext
files.Summary: Context information passed to edge renderers. Contains all the information needed to render an edge.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgeRenderers.EdgeRenderResult
files.Summary: Result of rendering an edge, containing all visual elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgeRenderers.EdgeRendererRegistry
files.Summary: Registry for custom edge renderers. Maps edge type strings to renderer implementations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgeRenderers.IEdgeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom edge renderers. Implement this interface to create custom visual representations for edge types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.EdgeVisualManager
files.Summary: Manages rendering and tracking of edge visuals including paths, markers, and labels. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing edge UI elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.GraphRenderModel
files.Summary: Central model that calculates all rendering geometry for a graph. This is the single source of truth for node bounds, port positions, edge paths, etc. Both VisualTree rendering and DirectDraw rendering use this model to ensure 100% visual parity.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.GraphRenderer
files.Summary: Coordinates rendering of all graph elements (nodes, ports, edges, handles). Acts as a facade over specialized visual managers for clean separation of concerns.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.ColorDisplayNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a color display output node. Shows a large color swatch with the received color value.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.ColorPickerNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a color picker input node. Uses Avalonia's built-in ColorView for full color selection with hex input fallback. The selected color is persisted in Node.Data as a uint (ARGB).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DataNodeRendererBase
files.Summary: Base class for data-bound node renderers. Provides common functionality for interactive nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DefaultNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Default node renderer that creates a standard bordered box with text. Supports inline label editing via IEditableNodeRenderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DirectNodeRenderContext
files.Summary: Context passed to with pre-calculated values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DisplayNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a display/output node.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.DropdownNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a dropdown node. Value persisted in Node.Data as DropdownData.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.GroupCollapseEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for group collapse toggle.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.GroupNodeRenderer
files.Summary:
Renderer for group nodes that contain other nodes. Uses a translucent background similar to React Flow's grouping style. Supports inline label editing via IEditableNodeRenderer.

IMPORTANT: This renderer uses constants from GraphRenderModel to ensure 100% visual parity with DirectGraphRenderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.HeaderedNodeRendererBase
files.Summary: Base class for nodes with a header section and content area (React Flow style). Structure: Outer border (rounded) -> Header (semi-transparent) + Body (solid white)

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.IDataNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Extended node renderer that supports data binding to port values. Implement this for nodes with interactive controls (sliders, color pickers, etc.).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.IDirectNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom node renderers that support direct DrawingContext rendering. Implement this interface in addition to to provide custom drawing logic for the high-performance DirectGraphRenderer mode.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.IEditableNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for node renderers that support inline label editing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.INodeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom node renderers. Implement this interface to create custom visual representations for node types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.InputNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for input nodes with a distinctive green color scheme. Displays a ">" icon and supports inline label editing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.NodeRenderContext
files.Summary: Context information passed to node renderers.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.NodeRendererRegistry
files.Summary: Registry for custom node type renderers. Register custom renderers to handle specific node types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.NumberInputNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a numeric input node. Value persisted in Node.Data as double.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.OutputDisplayNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders an output display node using the white headered base with large content area.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.OutputNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for output nodes with a distinctive red/coral color scheme. Displays a target/circle icon and supports inline label editing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.RadioButtonNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a radio button group node using the white headered base. Value persisted in Node.Data as RadioButtonData.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.SimplifiedNodeRenderer
files.Summary: A simplified node renderer optimized for large graphs. Uses minimal visual elements for better performance with 500+ nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.SliderNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a slider input node. Value persisted in Node.Data as double.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.StyledHeaderedNodeRendererBase
files.Summary: Headered node with accent-colored header (pink/rose tint). The header has a glassy semi-transparent pink background and pink text.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.StyledNodeRendererBase
files.Summary:
Base class for styled node renderers with icon and label support. Provides customizable colors, icons (text or geometry), and inline editing.

Override the abstract properties to customize appearance: - : Default text when no label is set - , : Node colors - , : Text/icon colors

For icons, override ONE of: - : Simple text icon (e.g., ">", "O", "?") - : Vector path for scalable icons (compatible with any icon library)

Using a Lucide icon path: 
// Get path data from any icon library (Lucide, Material, etc.)
protected override Geometry? IconGeometry => 
    Geometry.Parse("M5 12h14M12 5l7 7-7 7"); // arrow-right

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.TextInputNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a text input node. Value persisted in Node.Data as string.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.ToggleNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a checkbox/toggle node. Value persisted in Node.Data as bool.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.WhiteHeaderedNodeRendererBase
files.Summary: Headered node with neutral gray header (subtle gray tint). The header has a glassy semi-transparent gray background and gray text.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers.ZoomSliderNodeRenderer
files.Summary: Renders a zoom slider node using the white headered base. Value persisted in Node.Data as double.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeVisualManager
files.Summary: Manages rendering and tracking of node and port visuals. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing node/port UI elements. Uses GraphRenderModel for all geometry calculations to ensure visual parity with DirectGraphRenderer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers.DefaultPortRenderer
files.Summary: Default port renderer that creates circular port visuals. This is the standard port appearance used by FlowGraph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers.IPortRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom port renderers. Implement this interface to create custom visual representations for port types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers.PortRenderContext
files.Summary: Context information passed to port renderers.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers.PortRendererRegistry
files.Summary: Registry for port renderers. Maps port types to their visual renderers. Register custom port renderers to customize how ports are displayed.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.PortRenderers.PortVisualState
files.Summary: Represents the visual state of a port.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.RenderContext
files.Summary: Shared rendering context containing settings, viewport state, and coordinate transformation utilities. Used by all visual managers to ensure consistent rendering behavior.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ResizeHandleManager
files.Summary: Manages rendering and tracking of resize handle visuals for nodes. Responsible for creating, updating, and removing resize handle UI elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ResizeHandlePosition
files.Summary: Positions for resize handles on a node.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.EllipseRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for ellipse/circle shape elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.IShapeRenderer
files.Summary: Interface for custom shape renderers. Implement this interface to create visual representations for shape element types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.LineRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for line shape elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.RectangleRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for rectangle shape elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.ShapeRenderContext
files.Summary: Context object passed to shape renderers with information needed for rendering.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.ShapeRendererRegistry
files.Summary: Registry for shape renderers, allowing custom renderers for different shape types.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.ShapeVisualManager
files.Summary: Manages the visual representation of shape elements on the canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ShapeRenderers.TextRenderer
files.Summary: Renderer for text shape elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.ThemeResources
files.Summary:
Provides theme-aware resource access for FlowCanvas components.

All colors can be customized by defining resources in your App.axaml: 

<Application.Resources>
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="FlowCanvasNodeBackground" Color="#2D2D30"/>
    <SolidColorBrush x:Key="FlowCanvasNodeBorder" Color="#4682B4"/>
    <!-- etc. -->
</Application.Resources>

Available resource keys:

  • Canvas: FlowCanvasBackground, FlowCanvasGridColor
  • Node: FlowCanvasNodeBackground, FlowCanvasNodeBorder, FlowCanvasNodeSelectedBorder, FlowCanvasNodeText
  • Input Node: FlowCanvasInputNodeBackground, FlowCanvasInputNodeBorder, FlowCanvasInputNodeText, FlowCanvasInputNodeIcon
  • Output Node: FlowCanvasOutputNodeBackground, FlowCanvasOutputNodeBorder, FlowCanvasOutputNodeText, FlowCanvasOutputNodeIcon
  • Edge: FlowCanvasEdgeStroke, FlowCanvasEdgeSelectedStroke
  • Port: FlowCanvasPortBackground, FlowCanvasPortBorder, FlowCanvasPortHover, FlowCanvasPortValidConnection, FlowCanvasPortInvalidConnection
  • Group: FlowCanvasGroupBackground, FlowCanvasGroupBorder, FlowCanvasGroupLabelText
  • Selection: FlowCanvasSelectionBoxFill, FlowCanvasSelectionBoxStroke
  • Minimap: FlowCanvasMinimapBackground, FlowCanvasMinimapViewportFill, FlowCanvasMinimapViewportStroke

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.RouterAlgorithm
files.Summary: Available edge routing algorithms.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Routing.EdgeRoutingManager
files.Summary: Manages edge routing for the FlowCanvas, integrating the Core routing service with the UI layer.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.SelectionChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for selection changed event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.SelectionManager
files.Summary: Manages selection state for nodes and edges in the flow canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.SelectionMode
files.Summary: Mode for box selection behavior.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.CompositeConnectionValidator
files.Summary: Composite validator that combines multiple validators. All validators must pass for the connection to be valid.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.ConnectionContext
files.Summary: Context information for validating a connection.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.ConnectionValidationResult
files.Summary: Result of a connection validation.

files.Summary: Default connection validator that allows all connections.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.IConnectionValidator
files.Summary: Provides validation logic for connections between ports.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.NoCycleConnectionValidator
files.Summary: Connection validator that prevents cycles in the graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.NoDuplicateConnectionValidator
files.Summary: Connection validator that prevents duplicate connections.

files.Summary: Connection validator that prevents self-connections (node connecting to itself).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.Validation.TypeMatchingConnectionValidator
files.Summary: Connection validator that checks port type compatibility.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ViewportChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for viewport changed event.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Avalonia.ViewportState
files.Summary: Manages the viewport state including pan offset and zoom level.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.BulkObservableCollection<T>
files.Summary: An that can suppress notifications during batch operations. Use to add multiple items with a single notification.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.AddEdgeCommand
files.Summary: Command to add an edge to the graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.AddNodeCommand
files.Summary: Command to add a node to the graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.AddNodesToGroupCommand
files.Summary: Command to add nodes to an existing group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.AlreadyExecutedCommand
files.Summary: Wraps a command that has already been executed, skipping the initial Execute call. Used when an action was performed through UI and we just need to track it for undo/redo.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.CommandHistory
files.Summary: Manages command history for undo/redo functionality. Uses a bounded deque structure for O(1) trimming operations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.CompositeCommand
files.Summary: Command that groups multiple commands into a single undoable operation.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.DuplicateCommand
files.Summary: Command to duplicate nodes and edges.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.GroupNodesCommand
files.Summary: Command to group selected nodes into a new group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.IGraphCommand
files.Summary: Interface for reversible commands that support undo/redo.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.MoveElementsCommand
files.Summary: Command to move one or more elements (nodes, shapes) to new positions. Works with any ICanvasElement that has a settable Position property.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.MoveNodesCommand
files.Summary: Command to move one or more nodes to new positions.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.PasteCommand
files.Summary: Command to paste nodes and edges from clipboard.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.RemoveEdgeCommand
files.Summary: Command to remove an edge from the graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.RemoveEdgesCommand
files.Summary: Command to remove multiple edges from the graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.RemoveElementsCommand
files.Summary: Command to remove one or more elements from the graph. Supports nodes, edges, and shapes. For nodes, automatically removes connected edges.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.RemoveNodeCommand
files.Summary: Command to remove a node and its connected edges from the graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.RemoveNodesCommand
files.Summary: Command to remove multiple nodes and their connected edges.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.RemoveNodesFromGroupCommand
files.Summary: Command to remove nodes from their parent group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.ResizeElementsCommand.SizeSnapshot
files.Summary: Snapshot of an element's size and position for resize operations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.ResizeElementsCommand
files.Summary: Command to resize one or more elements (nodes, shapes). Works with any ICanvasElement that has settable Width/Height properties.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.ResizeNodeCommand
files.Summary: Command to resize a node.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.ToggleGroupCollapseCommand
files.Summary: Command to toggle a group's collapsed state.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Commands.UngroupNodesCommand
files.Summary: Command to ungroup nodes from a group.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.GraphExecutor
files.Summary: Executes a graph by propagating data through connected nodes. Uses topological sorting for correct execution order. Optimized for incremental updates - only re-executes affected nodes. Thread-safe for concurrent access from multiple threads.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.INodeProcessor
files.Summary: Interface for nodes that can process data. Implement this to create nodes that transform input values to output values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.IPortValue<T>
files.Summary: Represents a reactive port value that notifies when changed.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.IPortValue
files.Summary: Non-generic base interface for port values. Enables working with port values without knowing their concrete type.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.InputNodeProcessor<T>
files.Summary: A simple processor for nodes that only output values (no processing needed). Use this for input nodes like color pickers, sliders, text inputs, etc.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.NodeProcessedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for node processed events.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.NodeProcessor
files.Summary: Base class for typed node processors with specific input/output types. Provides helper methods for registering ports and managing values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.OutputNodeProcessor<T>
files.Summary: A processor for nodes that receive values and display/use them (no outputs). Use this for output/display nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.PortValueChangedEventArgs<T>
files.Summary: Typed event args for port value changes. Note: This class sets both the base class properties AND provides typed accessors.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.PortValueChangedEventArgs
files.Summary: Event args for port value changes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.Combine3Processor<TIn1, TIn2, TIn3, TOut>
files.Summary: A processor that combines three inputs into one output.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.CombineProcessor<TIn1, TIn2, TOut>
files.Summary: A processor that combines two inputs into one output.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.MathOperation
files.Summary: Math operations for MathProcessor.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.MathProcessor
files.Summary: A processor for numeric operations with two inputs.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.PassThroughProcessor<T>
files.Summary: A processor that passes through a single value unchanged. Useful for debugging or as a base for more complex processors.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.StringOperation
files.Summary: String operations for StringProcessor.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.StringProcessor
files.Summary: A processor for string operations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.Processors.TransformProcessor<TIn, TOut>
files.Summary: A processor that transforms a value using a function.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.DataFlow.ReactivePort<T>
files.Summary: A reactive port that stores a value and notifies when it changes. Thread-safe for UI binding scenarios.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.CompositeLogSink
files.Summary: Log sink that forwards entries to multiple other sinks.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.ConsoleLogSink
files.Summary: Log sink that writes to . Useful for console applications and terminal output.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.DebugLogSink
files.Summary: Log sink that writes to . Useful for development in Visual Studio and other IDEs.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.EdgeDiagnosticInfo
files.Summary: Diagnostic information about an edge.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.FileLogSink
files.Summary: Log sink that writes to a file with automatic rotation support.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.FlowGraphLogger.CorrelationScope
files.Summary: Scope for correlating related log entries.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.FlowGraphLogger
files.Summary: Central static logger for FlowGraph diagnostics. Thread-safe and designed for high-performance logging with minimal overhead when disabled.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.GraphDiagnosticSnapshot
files.Summary: Diagnostic snapshot of a graph's state.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.ILogSink
files.Summary: Interface for log sinks that receive and process log entries. Implement this interface to create custom log destinations (file, console, network, etc.).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.LogCategory
files.Summary: Defines the categories of diagnostic events in FlowGraph. Each category represents a distinct subsystem that can be independently configured.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.LogEntry
files.Summary: Represents a structured log entry with rich contextual information.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.LogLevel
files.Summary: Defines the severity levels for FlowGraph diagnostic logging.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.LoggerConfiguration
files.Summary: Fluent configuration builder for FlowGraphLogger.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.LoggingExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for FlowGraph diagnostic logging.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.MemoryLogSink
files.Summary: Log sink that stores entries in memory for retrieval. Useful for displaying logs in UI or testing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Diagnostics.NodeDiagnosticInfo
files.Summary: Diagnostic information about a node.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Edge
files.Summary: Represents a connection between two nodes. Uses a Definition (immutable) + State (mutable) composition pattern. Implements for unified element handling.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.EdgeMarker
files.Summary: Defines the marker (arrow) style at edge endpoints.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.EdgeType
files.Summary: Defines the visual style of an edge path.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.CanvasElement
files.Summary: Base class for all elements that can be placed on the canvas. Provides common properties for positioning, sizing, selection, and visibility.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.ElementCollection
files.Summary: An observable collection of canvas elements with typed accessors and lookup methods.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.ElementHitInfo
files.Summary: Unified hit test result for all canvas elements. Used for standardized tagging of controls and hit test payloads across both visual-tree and direct-rendering modes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.ICanvasElement
files.Summary: Base interface for all elements that can be placed on the canvas. Represents any positioned, sized, and selectable content in the coordinate system.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Rect
files.Summary: Represents a rectangle with position and size. Used for element bounds calculations.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.EllipseElement
files.Summary: An ellipse/circle shape element that can be rendered on the canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.FontStyle
files.Summary: Defines font style values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.FontWeight
files.Summary: Defines font weight values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.LineCapStyle
files.Summary: Defines the cap styles for line endpoints.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.LineElement
files.Summary: A line shape element that connects two points on the canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.RectangleElement
files.Summary: A rectangle shape element that can be rendered on the canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.ShapeElement
files.Summary: Base class for shape elements that can be rendered on the canvas. Shapes are arbitrary visual elements that are not nodes or edges.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.TextAlignment
files.Summary: Defines text alignment values.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Elements.Shapes.TextElement
files.Summary: A text shape element for displaying standalone text on the canvas.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Graph
files.Summary: Represents a flow graph containing nodes, edges, and other canvas elements. Provides methods for adding, removing, and querying graph elements.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.GraphDefaults
files.Summary: Default values used throughout the FlowGraph library. Centralizes constants to avoid duplication and ensure consistency.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.GraphGroupExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for working with node groups in a graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.EdgeDefinition
files.Summary: Immutable definition of an edge's identity and connection structure. Contains all properties that define "what" an edge connects, not its runtime state.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.EdgeRoutingMode
files.Summary: Determines how an edge's path is calculated.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.EdgeState
files.Summary: Default implementation of using . Provides framework-agnostic property change notification with no external dependencies.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.IEdgeState
files.Summary: Interface for the mutable runtime state of an edge. Separates selection and routing state from the immutable definition.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.INodeState
files.Summary: Interface for the mutable runtime state of a node. Separates position, size, and UI state from the immutable definition.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.LabelAnchor
files.Summary: Specifies where along an edge the label should be anchored.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.LabelInfo
files.Summary: Provides enhanced label positioning for edges with anchor points and offsets.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.NodeDefinition
files.Summary: Immutable definition of a node's identity and structure. Contains all properties that define "what" a node is, not "where" it is or its runtime state.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.NodeState
files.Summary: Default implementation of using . Provides framework-agnostic property change notification with no external dependencies.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.ObservableBase
files.Summary: Minimal base class for observable objects using pure .NET INotifyPropertyChanged. This class provides framework-agnostic property change notification without external dependencies like CommunityToolkit.Mvvm.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Models.PortDefinition
files.Summary: Immutable definition of a port on a node. Ports define the interface for data flow between nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Node
files.Summary: Represents a node in the flow graph. Uses a Definition (immutable) + State (mutable) composition pattern. Implements for unified element handling.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Port
files.Summary: Represents a connection point on a node where edges can attach. Ports define the interface for data flow between nodes.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.PortPosition
files.Summary: Position of a port on a node.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.PortPositionExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for .

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.BezierRouter
files.Summary: Simple bezier router that creates smooth curves between ports. Does not perform obstacle avoidance - for that, use .

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.DirectRouter
files.Summary: Simple edge router that doesn't modify paths (direct connection).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.EdgeCrossingStyle
files.Summary: Visual style for rendering edge crossings.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.EdgeRoutingContext
files.Summary: Context information for edge routing.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.EdgeRoutingOptions
files.Summary: Configuration options for edge routing behavior.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.EdgeRoutingService
files.Summary: Provides edge routing services for a graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.IEdgeRouter
files.Summary: Interface for edge routing algorithms.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.ManualRouter
files.Summary: Routes edges using user-defined waypoints without automatic path calculation. Used when is set.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.OrthogonalRouter
files.Summary: Routes edges using orthogonal (right-angle) paths that avoid obstacles. Uses A* pathfinding on a visibility graph.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.Rect
files.Summary: Represents a rectangle for collision detection.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Routing.SmartBezierRouter
files.Summary: Routes edges around obstacles using smooth curves with obstacle avoidance. Generates waypoints that can be used to create multi-segment bezier curves.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.EdgeDto
files.Summary: Data transfer object for Edge serialization.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.EdgeElementDto
files.Summary: Element DTO for Edge type.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.ElementDto
files.Summary: Polymorphic element DTO base class for Version 2 format. Uses "kind" discriminator to identify element type.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.GraphDto
files.Summary: Data transfer object for Graph serialization. Version 2 uses polymorphic elements[] array for unified element storage. Version 1 compatibility maintained via separate Nodes/Edges/Shapes lists.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.GraphSerializationExtensions
files.Summary: Extension methods for graph serialization.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.GraphSerializer
files.Summary: Serializes and deserializes graphs to/from JSON.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.LabelInfoDto
files.Summary: Data transfer object for LabelInfo serialization.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.NodeDto
files.Summary: Legacy data transfer object for Node serialization (Version 1 format). Maintained for backward compatibility when deserializing old files.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.NodeElementDto
files.Summary: Element DTO for Node type.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.PointDto
files.Summary: Data transfer object for Point serialization.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.PortDto
files.Summary: Data transfer object for Port serialization.

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.ShapeDto
files.Summary: Data transfer object for Shape serialization. Supports polymorphic shape types (rectangle, line, text, ellipse).

files.Title: FlowGraph.Core.Serialization.ShapeElementDto
files.Summary: Element DTO for Shape types (rectangle, line, text, ellipse).
